subject: RE: [junit] JBuilder 7 Enterprise and upgrading JUnit
msgSnippet: I don t know if you can upgrade the actual version of Junit used in the wizards, because the API changes sufficiently from 3.7 to 3.8 that some aspects of the
messageBody:
I don't know if you can upgrade the actual version of Junit used in the wizards, because the API changes sufficiently from 3.7 to 3.8 that some aspects of the wizards may not work. You CAN add Junit 3.8 jar file as a new required library and select that for junit work that doesn't use the internal wizards.

Hope this helps.

Simon

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Simon P. Chappell simon.chappell@...
Java Programming Specialist www.landsend.com
Lands' End, Inc. (608) 935-4526

>Subject: [junit] JBuilder 7 Enterprise and upgrading JUnit
>
>
>My installation of JBuilder 7 Enterprise has built-in/integrated
>support for JUnit 3.7. I'm curious if anybody knows how to update
>the IDE integration to use JUnit 3.8.1. Thanks.
>
